name: Enverve Coronet
description: The Enverve Coronet elegantly expresses a bitter emotion.

languages.description: Die Zierde: Enverve drückt elegant ein bitteres Gefühl aus.
languages.name: Zierde: Enverve

languages.description: La Couronne de Verve exprime avec élégance une émotion amère.
languages.name: Couronne de Verve

languages.description: La Corona Enverve esprime con eleganza un'emozione amara.
languages.name: Corona Enverve

languages.description: 엔버브 두관은 쓰디쓴 감정을 우아하게 표현합니다.
languages.name: 엔버브 두관

languages.description: La Corona Enverve expresa una emoción amarga con elegancia.
languages.name: Corona Enverve

languages.description: 激妒马冠优雅地传达了一种苦涩的情感。
languages.name: 激妒马冠

languages.description: Enverveコロネットはほろ苦い感情を華麗に表す。
languages.name: Enverve コロネット

languages.description: Korona Enverve elegancko wyraża gorzkie emocje.
languages.name: Korona Enverve

languages.description: A Coroa de Verve expressa elegantemente uma emoção amarga.
languages.name: Coroa de Verve

languages.description: 覬魄馬冠優雅地傳達了一股苦澀的情感。
languages.name: 覬魄馬冠

languages.description: มงกุฎ Enverve ที่สง่างามแสดงให้เห็นถึงอารมณ์ที่ขื่นขม
languages.name: มงกุฎ Enverve

languages.description: Enverve Tacı, acı bir duyguyu zarif bir şekilde ifade eder.
languages.name: Enverve Taç
